mapper.select: SELECT #{orgCd} AS orgCd FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT S.ORG_CD AS orgCd FROM ( SELECT F_WTM_GET_LOW_LEVEL_ORG(O.TENANT_ID, O.ENTER_CD, O.SYMD) AS ORG_CD , @level AS level FROM ( SELECT @start_with:=#{orgCd} , @org_cd:=@start_with , @level:=1 ) vars JOIN ( SELECT C.TENANT_ID , C.ENTER_CD , C.SYMD , C.EYMD , D.* FROM WTM_ORG_CHART C JOIN WTM_ORG_CHART_DET D ON C.ORG_CHART_ID = D.ORG_CHART_ID WHERE C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN C.SYMD AND C.EYMD ) O ) S WHERE S.ORG_CD IS NOT NULL
